      • OwnCloudFileDownloadHelper

        public OwnCloudFileDownloadHelper(Context context,
                                  Handler handler,
                                  java.lang.String server,
                                  java.lang.String username,
                                  java.lang.String password)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        context - the owner MUST implement OnRemoteOperationListener AND OnDatatransferProgressListener
        handler - a Handler instance so this has a Handler back to the UI thread
        server - the server's root URL
        username - the username to log in
        password - the user's password
